## About Me
I'm currently studying web development at Helsinki Business College in Finland.  ðŸ’» My focus is on honing my skills with the .NET framework, delving into the realms of C# and ASP.NET, while also exploring React and relational databases, particularly SQL. ðŸ“Š My toolkit also includes a touch of Python.
